ud4.4:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud4.4:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno kapotakandarāyaṁ viharanti.
ud4.4:1.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi abbhokāse nisinno hoti aññataraṁ samādhiṁ samāpajjitvā.
ud4.4:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena dve yakkhā sahāyakā uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṁ disaṁ gacchanti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
ud4.4:2.2_0: Addasaṁsu kho te yakkhā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi abbhokāse nisinnaṁ.
ud4.4:2.3_0: Disvāna eko yakkho dutiyaṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:2.4_0: “paṭibhāti maṁ, samma, imassa samaṇassa sīse pahāraṁ dātun”ti.
ud4.4:2.5_0: Evaṁ vutte, so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:2.7_0: Uḷāro so, samma, samaṇo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti.
ud4.4:3.1_0: Dutiyampi kho so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.2_0: “paṭibhāti maṁ, samma, imassa samaṇassa sīse pahāraṁ dātun”ti.
ud4.4:3.3_0: Dutiyampi kho so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.5_0: Uḷāro so, samma, samaṇo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti.
ud4.4:3.6_0: Tatiyampi kho so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.7_0: “paṭibhāti maṁ, samma, imassa samaṇassa sīse pahāraṁ dātun”ti.
ud4.4:3.8_0: Tatiyampi kho so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.10_0: Uḷāro so, samma, samaṇo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti.
ud4.4:4.1_0: Atha kho so yakkho taṁ yakkhaṁ anādiyitvā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa sīse pahāraṁ adāsi.
ud4.4:4.2_1: api tena pahārena sattaratanaṁ vā aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanaṁ vā nāgaṁ osādeyya,
ud4.4:4.3_0: Atha ca pana so yakkho “ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī”ti vatvā tattheva mahānirayaṁ apatāsi.
ud4.4:5.1_0: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tena yakkhena āyasmato sāriputtattherassa sīse pahāraṁ dīyamānaṁ.
ud4.4:5.2_0: Disvā yena āyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
ud4.4:5.3_0: “kacci te, āvuso, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ, kacci na kiñci dukkhan”ti?
ud4.4:5.4_0: “Khamanīyaṁ me, āvuso moggallāna, yāpanīyaṁ me, āvuso moggallāna;
ud4.4:5.5_0: api ca me sīsaṁ thokaṁ dukkhan”ti.
ud4.4:6.3_0: Idha te, āvuso sāriputta, aññataro yakkho sīse pahāraṁ adāsi.
ud4.4:6.4_1: api tena pahārena sattaratanaṁ vā aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanaṁ vā nāgaṁ osādeyya,
ud4.4:6.5_0: ‘khamanīyaṁ me, āvuso moggallāna, yāpanīyaṁ me, āvuso moggallāna;
ud4.4:6.6_0: api ca me sīsaṁ thokaṁ dukkhan’”ti.
ud4.4:7.2_0: Yāva mahiddhiko āyasmā mahāmoggallāno mahānubhāvo yatra hi nāma yakkhampi passissati.
ud4.4:8.1_0: Assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya tesaṁ ubhinnaṁ mahānāgānaṁ imaṁ evarūpaṁ kathāsallāpaṁ.
ud4.4:9.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
